Recipe Name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ice Cream Sandwiches
Ingredients: 
• 6 cups ice cream cookie dough (store-bought)
• 1 cup mini chocolate chip cookies (crushed)

Instructions: 
Preheat oven to 350°F.
Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place half of the cookie dough onto the prepared pan.
Top evenly with crushed cookies.
Cover with remaining cookie dough.
Press down gently to combine.
Refrigerate for 3

Recipe name: Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: chicken breasts, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, Italian seasoning, salt, black pepper.
Preparation Method: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 C). Cut chicken breasts horizontally into thin cutlets. Season both sides of the chicken with Italian seasoning, salt, and black pepper. Dredge chicken pieces in bread crumbs. Place chicken onto a greased cookie sheet. Pour marinara sauce over top of chicken. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella and grated parmesan cheeses evenly across the chicken. Bake uncovered for approximately 20–25 minutes or until internal temperature reads 165° F (74 °C).

Allergens: milk, eggs, fish
Instructions:
Prep Time: 1 hour

Yield: 8 servings

Pit and slice peaches. In another bowl combine sliced peaches, lime juice, and gelatin.

Recipe name: Chicken Parmesan Stuffed Peppers
Ingredients: chicken breasts, bell peppers, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, olive oil, Italian seasoning, salt, black pepper.
Preparation Instructions: 
1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 C).
2. Cut tops off of bell peppers and remove seeds and membranes.
3. Place chicken breast halves into food processor and pulse several times until finely chopped.
4. In large bowl mix together chicken mixture, bread crumbs, 1 cup grated mozzarella, ¼ cup grated parmesan, 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning, ½ teaspoon salt, and ⅛ teaspoon black pepper.
5. Stuff prepared chicken mixture evenly among all peppers.
